text:
Got 1st #Pfizer in Grand Junction hosted by Mesa County Public Health. I have #Vaccine card! 

Clinic gives 2000 shots/day, growing to 6000 shots/day. 

The #volunteers were lovely! THANK YOU! #Grateful #gratitude
